Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:33:11
Folder: C1U3KRF - bossa - sephora kuwait
Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1U3KRF_00
From: Sayed Sharaf <Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-18 19:48
Subject: FW: BOSSA - Sephora Kuwait
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Hagop,

 

I hope all is well on your end.

 

I am in the process of finalizing the attached BOSSA with Sephora for Kuwait, and I have noticed that they have included some insurance related obligations in Article 16. 

 

I am requesting their removal on the basis that this requirement has not been included in other jurisdictions, however I would appreciate your confirmation on whether this is something we have previously agreed to with the LVMH JVs, or if it is something we could eventually agree to include moving forward.

 

Please let me know your thoughts.

 

Thank you and best regards,

Sayed Adnan

 

    

From: BELHADDAD Salah <sbelhaddad@sephora.ae <mailto:sbelhaddad@sephora.ae> > 
Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 3:13 PM
To: Sayed Sharaf <Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: ELBAYWOMY Ahmed <AAdel@sephora.ae <mailto:AAdel@sephora.ae> >
Subject: RE: BOSSA - Sephora Kuwait

 

Hello Sayed,

 

Thank you for your welcome.

 

Please find attached the agreement reviewed.

From: BELHADDAD Salah <sbelhaddad@sephora.ae <mailto:sbelhaddad@sephora.ae> > 
Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 3:13 PM
To: Sayed Sharaf <Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: ELBAYWOMY Ahmed <AAdel@sephora.ae <mailto:AAdel@sephora.ae> >
Subject: RE: BOSSA - Sephora Kuwait

 

Hello Sayed,

 

Thank you for your welcome.

 

Please find attached the agreement reviewed. 

 

For your perfect information, I’ve included provisions aligned with the Group Policies (e.g. Ethics and Compliance, Environment…) and a Data Processing Agreement to comply with Data Protection regulations and standards. As this agreement will probably be duplicated for the other entities, it is good to have everything in place.

 

Should you have any question, I’ll be happy to discuss that with you.

 

Kind regards,

 

Salah

BELHADDAD

Senior Legal Counsel
